name: Dragon Tap Free
description:
• Dragon Tap Free •

Dragon Tap will test your reflex skills and ability to problem solve, despite its simple design. Your ultimate impossible goal is to continually guide your dragon through the tall candy obstacles in order to score as many points as you can. Sounds simple? It's not!

• FEATURES •

- One touch controls, touch to flap the wings
- Tap anywhere on the screen to fly higher!
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
- Stunning graphics, beautifully detailed world comes to life

Help the dragon fly in his neverending pursuit of candy!

- Lots of fun
- Nice graphics
- Challenging game physics
- Addicting gameplay
- Clear and simple UI
- Leaderboard
What are you waiting for? GET IT NOW!
